channel.title: They finally removed that annoying landing page
channel.description: I don't know if anyone noticed. But they finally removed the really obnoxious and annoying landing page for http://www.runescape.com It bothered me (yes, I'm OCD like this) that you couldn't get directly in the game as a player, as fast as normal. Normally if you went to runescape.com. You'd have to scroll to the very bottom, click "Continue to full website" and then click play now. That page no longer exists, and you don't need to go to the url: http://www.runescape.com/title.ws?=1 (How the hell I remembered that, I don't know.). Yeah, that's all.

item.title: They finally removed that annoying landing page
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:484013”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=602249.msg4220929#msg4220929 date=1360737029]
It shouldn’t be there but once, and that is the first time you visit the website.
[/quote]
I actually cleared my browsers cache, and boom, it was gone.[/quote]It’s stored in cookies.

Read full topic

item.title: They finally removed that annoying landing page
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t know if anyone noticed. But they finally removed the really obnoxious and annoying landing page for http://www.runescape.com
It bothered me (yes, I’m OCD like this) that you couldn’t get directly in the game as a player, as fast as normal. Normally if you went to runescape.com. You’d have to scroll to the very bottom, click “Continue to full website” and then click play now. That page no longer exists, and you don’t need to go to the url: http://www.runescape.com/title.ws?=1 (How the hell I remembered that, I don’t know.).
Yeah, that’s all.

Read full topic
